rules.name: allayableVexes
rules.description: Allows Vexes to turn into Allays when played the correct Note Block sequence

rules.name: commandSkyIsland
rules.description: Enables /skyisland command for generating new spawn platforms
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: coralErosion
rules.description: Makes Dead Coral erode into Sand when Water flows out of it

rules.name: foxesSpawnWithSweetBerriesChance
rules.description: Probability that Foxes spawn with Sweet Berries

rules.name: gatewaysSpawnChorus
rules.description: Makes Chorus generate on Endstone Islands generated by End Gateways

rules.name: generateAncientCityPortals
rules.description: Generates Ancient City portal frames in a SkyBlock world

rules.name: generateEndPortals
rules.description: Generates End Portal frames in a SkyBlock world

rules.name: generateMagmaCubeSpawners
rules.description: Generates Magma Cube spawners in a SkyBlock world

rules.name: generateRandomEndGateways
rules.description: Generates random End Gateways in the Outer End Islands in a SkyBlock world

rules.name: generateSilverfishSpawners
rules.description: Generates Silverfish spawners in a SkyBlock world

rules.name: hugeMushroomsSpreadMycelium
rules.description: Makes Mushrooms spread Mycelium onto dirt-like blocks nearby when Bonemealed into Huge Mushrooms

rules.name: lavaFromWanderingTrader
rules.description: Allows the Wandering Trader to sell Lava

rules.name: lightningElectrifiesVines
rules.description: Makes Lightning convert Vines attached to Glowstone into Glow Lichen when it strikes the Glowstone
extras: The Lightning can also strike a Lightning Rod on the Glowstone.

rules.name: maxWanderingTraderSpawnChance
rules.description: Max Wandering Trader spawn chance
extras: This starts at 0.025 and increases by 0.025 each time a trader spawn fails until the max chance is reached.

rules.name: poisonousPotatoesConvertSpiders
rules.description: Makes Spiders turn into Cave Spiders when right-clicked with a Poisonous Potato

rules.name: rammingWart
rules.description: Allows a ramming Goat to break Nether Wart Blocks into Nether Wart

rules.name: renewableBuddingAmethysts
rules.description: Makes Lava convert into a Budding Amethyst when surrounded by Calcite and Smooth Basalt

rules.name: renewableDeepslate
rules.description: Allows Thick Potions to convert Stone into Deepslate, either by right-clicking or using a splash potion
extras: With no_splash: splash potion conversion is disabled.

rules.name: renewableDiamonds
rules.description: Allows Falling Anvils to compact stacks of Coal Blocks into a Diamonds

rules.name: renewableDragonHeads
rules.description: Makes Ender Dragons drop their heads when killed by a Charged Creepers

rules.name: renewableEchoShards
rules.description: Makes Creatures with Echolocation (Bats and Dolphins) drop Echo Shards when killed by a Warden's Sonic Boom attack

rules.name: renewableHeartsOfTheSea
rules.description: Allows Dolphins to dig up Hearts of the Sea when given a Fish

rules.name: renewableNetherrack
rules.description: Makes Netherrack or Nylium generate around Nether Portals that generate midair
extras: What generates depends on the biome, with Nyliums generating in their respective forests and Netherrack elsewhere

rules.name: renewableSwiftSneak
rules.description: Allows Enchanting Tables near Wardens to enchant with Swift Sneak

rules.name: saplingsDieOnSand
rules.description: Allows Saplings to be placed on Sand, but they soon turn into Dead Bushes

rules.name: shulkerSpawnsOnDragonKill
rules.description: Makes a Shulker spawn on the Bedrock Pillar when the End Dragon is re-killed

rules.name: tallFlowersFromWanderingTrader
rules.description: Allows the Wandering Trader to sell tall flowers

rules.name: wanderingTraderSpawnRate
rules.description: How often the Wandering Trader attempts to spawn in ticks
